channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Consistent bad bin placement, 21st November
item.description:
Some bins are un- numbered. Others are from 20 vernham road - not even vambery road house. They have been warned by council before. All bins are obstructing the pavement. Vernham road bins shouldn't be there

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Admaston Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary traffic lights not working, 21st November
item.description:
3 way control lights on charlton road at the junction with marlborough road and victoria way are not working.almost caught in an accident as the lights on victoria way went green and as i turned into charlton road all the traffic was coming towards me forcing me to mount the pavement to avoid cars and buses.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Charlton Road, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollards unlit, 21st November
item.description:

item.title: Dumped tins of paint, 21st November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Okehampton Crescent, East Wickham, Greater London
